t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Amazon Brand Registry is a free program that helps you protect and grow your brand, even if you don’t sell in the Amazon store.

t: How to Change Your Brand Name on Amazon in 2025
s: January 23, 2025 - Contrary to popular belief, you can’t simply “rebrand” an existing ASIN on Amazon without creating an entirely new listing. In most circumstances, full rebrands are disallowed—Amazon’s policies are very strict about any changes that fundamentally alter a product’s identity.
Amazon Brand Registry is a free program that helps you protect your intellectual property (IP), manage your listings, and grow your business—whether or not you sell in the Amazon store.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: What is Amazon Brand Registry? How does it work? - Sell on Amazon
s: June 19, 2023 - Automated protections: Stop bad listings before they get published. When you provide data about your brand, products, and intellectual property, we implement predictive protections using advanced machine learning that prevent bad listings.

t: Brand management: Guide to growing your brand on Amazon
s: March 26, 2025 - From enhancing your product detail pages and increasing customer engagement, to generating customer reviews and protecting against counterfeits, the program takes the guesswork out of brand management. New sellers can also enjoy bonuses and credits after enrolling a brand in Brand Registry.

t: All Your Favorite Brands, From BSTOEM to ZGGCD - The New York Times
s: February 11, 2020 - Brands like Pvendor, RIVMOUNT, FRETREE and MAJCF. Gloves emblazoned with names like Nertpow, SHSTFD, Joyoldelf, VBIGER and Bizzliz. Gloves with hundreds or even thousands of apparently positive reviews, available for very low prices, shipped quickly, for free, with Amazon Prime.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: The Importance of Amazon Brand Building
s: December 4, 2024 - Building a brand on Amazon helps establish trust and credibility with customers. Amazon's reputation for reliable and secure transactions creates a sense of confidence in shoppers, which can positively reflect on your brand.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: To maintain brand integrity, do not alter the logo artwork, proportion, or color.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
